title: Leveled up to level 60 buy didnt get capsule.
body: I didnt get ,y level 60 capsule after a game, there wasnt a level up animation too. Help me. When will i get it?

replies.body:
I've seen a few of these missing levelup capsules reported, so far it does seem like it's mostly only happened for EUW which could, in fact, be related to this minor visual XP bug we saw a bit ago. After checking with my peeps over in EU, they let me know that a majority of these cases that they've already investigated actually got their capsules after a small delay, so do me a favor and wait a few hours to see if it comes through. 

If you don't see it later tonight or tomorrow, please go ahead shoot your EU agents a ticket for them to manually look into your missing capsule!

Based on a previous similar thread, it sounds like EUW capsules are being delayed for some odd reason. People are getting them after a few hours delay. Broporo suggested that you'd wait and see if it arrives, and if it doesn't within 12 hours, to send in a ticket.
I leveled up today (to lvl 49) and didn't receive any capsule (NA server).
